description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the vulnerability identified as CVE-2023-20588, you should apply the relevant updates corresponding to your Windows version:

1. Identify the build number of your Windows system to ensure compatibility.
2. Download and apply the appropriate KB updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
3. Restart your system after installation to make sure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
The following KB articles address the CVE-2023-20588 issue:
- For Windows 11 for x64-based Systems: [KB5033383](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033383), [KB5033373](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033373), etc.
- For Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: [KB5033379](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033379), etc.
- Ensure you retrieve the updates that match your current operating system and architecture.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is connected to the internet to download updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installations.
